kClothesData.title: Stormwear™ Dinosaur Padded Raincoat
kClothesData.desc: With its cosy borg lining in the hood and body, this cheery dinosaur raincoat adds snugness on chilly days. This padded style is cut in a comfy regular fit, with elasticated cuffs and hem to lock in warmth. A zip fastening lets them adjust their insulation levels. The popper-fastened front pockets are fleece-lined for warmth and there's an extra internal pocket for valuables. Stormwear™ technology helps them stay dry in a shower. Made with recycled polyester filling.

kClothesData.title: Stormwear™ Lightweight Padded Coat
kClothesData.desc: With its bright ombre design, this coat is both cool and practical. Comfy regular fit, with a cosy hood, zip-through fastening and contrast lining. Our water-repellent Stormwear™ technology keeps them dry, while the padding provides lightweight warmth. Plus, there are two handy zipped pockets. Made with recycled polyester filling.

kClothesData.title: Stormwear™ Colour Block Padded Raincoat
kClothesData.desc: This padded raincoat has a cheerful colour block design for extra brightness on showery days. Cut in a comfy regular fit, with a practical zip fastening. A borg lining in the hood and body adds insulation and the elasticated cuffs and waistband lock in warmth. The fleece-lined front pockets have popper fastenings and there's an inside pocket to keep valuables secure. Plus, water-repellent Stormwear™ technology helps keep them dry in the rain. Made with recycled polyester filling.

kClothesData.title: 3pk Pure Cotton Animal Print Pyjama Sets (1-7 Yrs)
kClothesData.desc: Keep them comfy at bedtime with these pure cotton pyjamas. Set of three, all cut to a regular fit. Long-sleeved top with classic round neck. Pull-on long bottoms. All-over animal print on each pair, featuring horses, cats and dogs for a playful feel. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: Stormwear™ Padded Coat
kClothesData.desc: Kids can adventure whatever the weather in this classic coat. The padded design is cut to a comfy regular fit. It features a cosy lining and a zip-through fastening to keep them feeling snug. A hood and our clever water-repellent Stormwear™ technology offer extra protection from the elements. The colour block pattern gives a bold look.

kClothesData.title: Online Exclusive
kClothesData.desc: This coat brings extra cheer to cooler days. It's cut in a comfy regular fit, with elasticated cuffs to keep in the warmth. A bold colourblock design adds a statement touch. If the weather turns showery, our water-resistant Stormwear™ finish gives protection from raindrops. The interior label has space for up to three names so it's simple to pass down. Made with recycled polyester filling.

kClothesData.title: 2pk Cotton Rich Spider-Man™ Joggers (2-7 Yrs)
kClothesData.desc: Make them feel like superheroes in these cotton-rich Spider-Man™ joggers. Comfy regular fit with drawstring waists. Printed slogans include 'Spider power' and 'Crime fighter.' We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: 2pk Pure Cotton Patterned Pyjama Sets
kClothesData.desc: After a long day of fun, kids will love throwing on these pure cotton pyjamas. Pack of two regular fit sets, consisting of a long-sleeved top and bottoms with a comfy elasticated waist. One design features star doodles on the chest and striped bottoms. The other style includes star print bottoms and a heart motif on the chest. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: 3pk Pure Cotton Butterfly Print Pyjama Sets (1-7 Yrs)
kClothesData.desc: Get their sleepwear sorted with this three-pack of pure cotton pyjamas. Easy regular fit. The long sleeve tops feature round necklines. Comfy pull-on style long bottoms with ribbed cuffs at the ankles to keep warmth in. Two pairs have floaty butterfly prints and one has a bright ditsy floral pattern. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: Sequin Bomber Jacket (6-16 Yrs)
kClothesData.desc: They'll shimmer through parties, play dates and weekends in this colourful sequin bomber. It's cut in a regular fit, with an easy zip-through front. Added stretch makes sure it's super comfortable. The sporty ribbed trims feature glittery stripes for a further touch of sparkle.

kClothesData.title: 2pk Cotton Rich Batman™ Joggers (2-3 Yrs)
kClothesData.desc: Young caped crusaders will be ready for action with this pack of cotton-rich Batman™ joggers. Cut to a regular fit with a comfy drawstring waist. One pair features Batman™ striding in front of the Batwing logo, with a Gotham City graphic at the cuffs. The other has the Batman™ logo as a motif. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: Online Exclusive
kClothesData.desc: This snug shacket has a touch of wool in the fabric, making it extra cosy. Cut to a regular fit with a full lining and decorated with a lively checked print for a contemporary feel. Popper fastenings add to the authentic look.

kClothesData.title: 2pk Pure Cotton Slogan Pyjama Sets (6-16 Yrs)
kClothesData.desc: Budding athletes can enjoy their downtime in these comfy pure cotton pyjamas. Multipack includes two regular fit pairs, each with a warm long-sleeved top and cosy cuffed bottoms. They feature sporty elements such as a 'Track and Field' slogan and letter badges. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: Stormwear™ Lightweight Padded Ombre Jacket
kClothesData.desc: With its funky ombre shading, this jacket ensures a cool and stylish look on in-between days. It's cut in a comfy regular fit, with light padding. A zip fastening and snug hood enable multiple styling options and water-repellent Stormwear™ technology helps keep them dry in a shower. Made with recycled polyester.

kClothesData.title: 2pk Pure Cotton Bunny Pyjama Sets (1-7 Yrs)
kClothesData.desc: These pure cotton pyjamas have an adorable bunny theme to bring extra sweetness to bedtime. Regular fit, with long sleeves and legs for warmth. Ribbing at the wrists and ankles gives extra snugness. Two-pack contains one pair with an all-over rabbit print and one with a placement design. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: Denim Harry Potter™ Pinafore
kClothesData.desc: They will look enchanting in this denim Harry Potter™ pinafore. Comfy regular fit with clasp fastenings and adjustable straps. Embroidery and appliqué decoration includes the Hogwarts crest, Hedwig, a moon and a lightning flash. Dyeing with pre-reduced indigo reduces water and chemical use in production. Made from pure cotton denim. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: 2pk Cotton Rich Batman™ Joggers (2-7 Yrs)
kClothesData.desc: Anyone can be a hero in these cotton-rich Batman™ joggers. Pack of two regular fit pairs. With comfy drawstring fastenings and cuffed legs. One is decorated with an all-over print and the other has bat motifs on the knees and a Batman™ graphic on the right leg. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: Cotton Rich Jurassic World™ Hoodie
kClothesData.desc: With its cotton-rich fabric, this Jurassic World™ hoodie will keep dinosaur fans snug on cooler days. Easy regular fit, with a zip-through fastening and ribbed cuffs for warmth. The front has the Jurassic World™ logo embroidered on the chest, and the back is embellished with the iconic T-rex badge in puff printing. Pockets on the waist are ideal for storing fossils, dino treats and other treasures! We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: Borg Camouflage Jacket
kClothesData.desc: With its soft borg texture, this snug jacket is ideal for chilly days. It's made in our classic regular fit and features a stand-up collar, easy zip-through closure and insulating long sleeves. A dynamic camouflage strip is splashed along the centre, collar and buttoned chest pocket for a playful touch. It's finished with a handy kangaroo split pocket at the front.

kClothesData.title: Stormwear™ Lightweight Padded Coat (6-16 Yrs)
kClothesData.desc: This lightweight coat brings a cool pop of animal print to drizzly days. Regular fit, with a zip-through fastening and snug hood. Our water-repellent Stormwear™ technology keeps them dry. Plus, it's lightly padded for warmth. Finished with a contrast lining and handy zipped pockets at the front. Made with recycled polyester filling.

kClothesData.title: Online Exclusive
kClothesData.desc: This padded gilet gives them extra warmth around their core while leaving their arms free – a perfect choice for in-between days. It's cut in a comfy regular fit, with an easy zip fastening and an elasticated hem to keep out draughts. Our water-repellent Stormwear™ water technology ensures protection from sudden showers. Plus, the interior name label has space for up to three names so you can easily pass them down. Made with recycled polyester filling.

kClothesData.title: Cotton Rich Harry Potter™ Bomber
kClothesData.desc: If they need an extra layer to wear to Quidditch, magic up this cotton-rich Harry Potter™ bomber. It's cut to a comfortable regular fit, with popper fastenings down the front. The jacket features contrast sleeves and front pockets as well as a striped ribbed hem, collar and cuffs. A Hogwarts badge completes the piece. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: Online Exclusive
kClothesData.desc: Add a roarsome feel to their walks to school with this fisherman coat. It's cut to a comfy regular fit and features a zip-through fastening. A playful dinosaur print wraps around from the front to the back while the cosy borg-lined hood is complete with padded spikes. Ribbed stormcuffs help to lock in warmth. The fabric is finished with our clever water-repellent Stormwear™ technology, providing extra protection from the elements.

kClothesData.title: Denim Harry Potter™ Dungarees
kClothesData.desc: Unleash their inner magic with these Harry Potter™ denim dungarees. Comfy regular fit with adjustable straps featuring clasp fastenings. Front and side pockets make room for their spellbinding essentials. Finished with appliqué including a Hogwarts badge, the Golden Snitch and a lightning bolt. All M&S denim is made with responsibly sourced cotton and less water.

kClothesData.title: 2pk Pure Cotton Checked Pyjama Sets
kClothesData.desc: They'll unwind in comfort in these pure cotton pyjamas. Pack of two regular fit sets. Includes plain tops with long sleeves and checked bottoms with an elasticated waist for a great fit. Finished with pocket detailing on the chest. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: Online Exclusive
kClothesData.desc: Kids will stay comfy in this three-in-one fisherman coat, come rain or shine. It's designed in an easy regular fit, with a hood and zip fastening. Our water-repellent Stormwear™ finish helps to keep the rain at bay and the butterfly print adds a pretty finish. The 3-in1 design means they can wear the outer raincoat alone to stay dry in the drizzle, the inner quilted layer on its own to keep warm, or both together for maximum coverage. The label on the inside has room for up to three names for when it's time to hand down their coat.

kClothesData.title: Sequin Dress
kClothesData.desc: This sequin-embellished dress is just the ticket for after-school discos and weekend party plans. Modern straight fit design with a simple round neckline and breezy cap sleeves. Finished with a button fastening at the back of the neck.

kClothesData.title: 5pk Pure Cotton Tops
kClothesData.desc: Add to their casualwear collection with this five-pack of pure cotton tops. Comfy regular fit, with long sleeves and a neat round neck. Pack comprises four plain tops and one with a distinctive animal print. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: Sequin Bomber Jacket (2 - 7 Yrs)
kClothesData.desc: This bomber jacket is covered in shimmery sequins that are sure to spark delight. Regular fit, with a zip-up front and added stretch for comfort. Ribbed trims at the neck, cuffs and hem help to trap in warmth.

kClothesData.title: Online Exclusive
kClothesData.desc: Give kids an extra layer of protection with this drizzle-proof gilet. Regular fit, with easy popper fastenings through the front. The unique quilted design delivers extra style points, while the padding provides lightweight warmth. Plus, our water-repellent Stormwear™ technology means rain rolls right off.

kClothesData.title: Harry Potter™ Faux Fur Hooded Bomber
kClothesData.desc: Wannabe witches, wizards and Muggles can show off their Harry Potter™ fandom in style with this lined, soft faux-fur jacket. Regular fit. Featuring an easy zip fastening, and a hood and pockets for extra warmth. Finished with Harry Potter™ and Hogwarts™ patches all over, and magical sparkly trims at the cuffs.

kClothesData.title: Batman™ Bomber
kClothesData.desc: Fans of winged superheroes will love this cool padded bomber. Regular fit, with popper fastenings. Detachable jersey hood in a striking contrast colour. Cosy ribbed trims and side pockets to keep hands warm. Features the Batman™ logo on the back as well as appliqué badges on the arms and front.

kClothesData.title: Stormwear™ Bunny Print Padded Coat
kClothesData.desc: Staying warm and dry is super cute with this coat, decorated with sweet bunnies. It's made to a comfortable regular fit, with a cosy hood and an easy zip fastening. A removable, quilted and fluffy layer keeps out the chill, while our Stormwear™ technology repels the rain to keep them nice and dry.

kClothesData.title: 3pk Cotton Rich Tops
kClothesData.desc: Bring newness to their basics with these cotton-rich tops. Pack of three regular fit designs including two plain and one ditsy floral print. Complete with added stretch for comfort. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes.

kClothesData.title: Pack of 3 Pure Cotton Nightwear Set
kClothesData.desc: Take care of your child's loungewear needs with this pack of 3. Comprising three full-sleeve tees and three printed joggers, it will make them look cute as a button. With prints showcasing rainbows and stripers, this 100% cotton set is a no-brainer.

kClothesData.title: Stormwear™ Camouflage Padded Gilet
kClothesData.desc: Give their casualwear a modern twist with this bold camouflage gilet. It's cut to a comfy regular fit with cotton rib neck and popper fastening to help lock in the warmth. Diamond-shaped quilting and light padding make this great for popping on if they start to get chilly. Our clever water-repellent Stormwear™ technology helps to keep them dry if it showers.
